com.twitter.heron.common.network

Class HeronServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.common.network.HeronServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISelectHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetricsManagerServer

    public abstract class HeronServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISelectHandler
    Any Heron Server should implement this abstract class. In particular it should implement a) onConnect method called when a new client connects to us b) onClose method called when a existing client closes c) onRequest method called when we have a new request d) onMessage method called when we have a new message
